name: PaintVenture
description:
In a World without colors

Artists come from all over the land

To PAINT and COLOR it

Earning Prestige and becoming the most renowned artist in the Kingdom

Are you ready for your painting adventure? or as we call it a PaintVenture!!

Use your mouse to paint your hero's road and guide him through Forests, Mountains, towns, and castles.

Make sure to never run out of paint use the towns to refill your bucket

The more you paint and the more prestige you'll get

Each section of the kingdom requires more and more prestige

So paint, paint and paint

Controls

Left Mouse Key to paint the road

Credits

Tourdion by Nomen Est Omen

Everything else was made using Godot by Fadrik Alexander and Sander Vanhove for Gotm Jam #14.

The Art was made by Adobe Illustrator by Katreen Ashy
